committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of Return Day in Georgetown, Delaware.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in commemoration of Return Day in Georgetown, Delaware.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of Return Day in Georgetown, Delaware.
